name: My Planet [RTS]
description:
Continuation of End War RTS, New Play Instant Game

My Planet is an exploratory strategic game. The world is divided into layers, surface layers and many underground layers. The more minerals are decomposed, the higher the resources are, the more monsters are at the bottom, and the more powerful they are. Each layer has holes in the upper and lower layers.

The whole world is automatically generated, each time different, diverse experience, Max map 400*400

Human and alien races are optional, multi-level game space, multi-type mineral support and manufacturing

There are three kinds of minerals in the generating unit, gold, metal and uranium, and the underground resources are the most abundant.

The control unit basically continued End War RTS, with some changes.

Support computer automatic hang-up, support 8-bit image

In this three-dimensional world, you have to face not only players, but also powerful third-party BOSS, fight hard.
